column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This place is pretty much the best ramen in Houston. Compared to Tiger Den and Samurai
column3: the broth and noodles here are just ahead of the curve. Karaage (Japanese fried chicken) and the Spicy Umami Miso Ramen are must eats. The Tonkotsu Black and White are damn good
column4: too...I have always wanted to try the butter add-on to the ramen
column6: drop me a line and let me know how it is. Seems pretty decadent
column7: so I stick with the fresh garlic (which comes with its own garlic press
